name: Detective Philadelphia
description:
In Detective Philadelphia you take on the shoes of Jack Johnson, an ex-PPD (Philadelphia Police Department) detective turned Private Investigator, burdened with the task of solving the mystery behind his old partner’s death. Before the murder, his partner had been working on one of the biggest cases that ever came by the PPD. That same case will serve as your main source of information to help you bring light to his fate.

The game’s action will take place entirely in the ex-partner’s closed office shortly after his death. While navigating the office you must find all sorts of evidence and secrets hidden all around the office, then connect that same evidence in logical ways to create meaningful deductions that will bring you closer to cracking the mystery of the case and your partner’s death.

IMPORTANT NOTE: The project was made in only 6 months for a university project and is very much still a work in progress. The game still contains bugs and features that need tweaking.

The art is also not final.
